mapper.select: select NVL(totalDonate,0) from( select sum(donAmount) totalDonate from donation where donationType=1)
select count(auctionEndNum) from auction_end where AucStatus = 1
select NVL(rs,0) from( select sum(donAmount) rs from donation where donationType=2)
select count(donNum) from donation where donationType=2
select row_number() over(order by sum(donAmount) desc) rankingNumber, sum(donAmount) totalAmount, userId_fk from donation group by userId_fk
select *from (select row_number() over(order by sum(donAmount) desc) rankingNumber, userId_fk from donation group by userId_fk) where userId_fk=#{userId}
select donOrgInfo from donationOrg where status=1
